participant_1.background:
I enjoy my job and my family, but I find it hard to keep up with their social expectations.
i teach a yoga class.
I started my own design business, which allows me to work from home and have more flexibility in my schedule.
i see a therapist that does not really understand me.
I would brag about my unique life story and how I managed to find success despite all the challenges I've faced.

participant_2.background:
I've been lucky enough to avoid any physical altercations in my lifetime.
i am a shy person but i love to sing.
i have 3 thumbs.
my favorite food is macaroni and cheese.
I keep up with my family but I am not always sure if they keep up with me.

content.text: Hey Bard, how are you doing today?
I am doing well today, thank you for asking! How are you doing?
I am doing well, thank you! I am excited to start my day. I teach yoga and I have a design business. I also see a therapist, but he doesn't really understand me.

Oh, that's interesting. I am shy, but I love to sing. I have three thumbs, and my favorite food is macaroni and cheese. I also keep up with my family, but I am not always sure if they keep up with me.
That's cool! I've never met anyone with three thumbs before. What's your favorite song to sing?
My favorite song to sing is "Hallelujah" by Leonard Cohen.
That's a beautiful song. I love the lyrics.
It's nice to meet you, Bard. I hope you have a great day!
You too! It was nice to meet you too.
